name: Hammer Time - GMTK19
description:
GOAL:

Survive 1 minute to win.

HOW TO PLAY:
To defeat the enemies the player must match the enemy color. So if the enemy is red you must be red to deal damage. If the player is not the correct color, the player will take damage. 

The player can only be ONE color at a time. To change color touch the color cube in the center to change to the cube's color. If the cube is yellow the player will turn yellow allowing the player to attack yellow enemies.

To deal damage you can run into the enemies using your body as long as you match the enemy color. The player also has ONE color hammer that can be thrown at enemies to deal damage. The hammer color will match the player color and will only damage enemies with the matching color. Once the hammer is thrown the player must pick it back up to use the hammer again!

CONTROLS:
A - MOVE LEFT
D - MOVE RIGHT
SPACE - JUMP
SPACE [IN AIR] - DOUBLE JUMP
MOUSE - AIM
LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - THROW HAMMER
